LanguageData.Ant_BirdLeatherApparel.stages.0.label: 새 가죽 {0}
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLeatherApparel.stages.1.label: 새 가죽 {0} (+1)
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLeatherApparel.stages.2.label: 새 가죽 {0} (+2)
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLeatherApparel.stages.3.label: 새 가죽 {0} etc
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLeatherApparel.stages.3.descript: 내가 모든 새들을 입고있어! 내 몸이 완전 새들로 뒤덮여있어!!
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLoverSawBird.stages.0.label: 새를 봄
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLoverSawBird.stages.1.label: 새를 봄 (x2)
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLoverSawBird.stages.2.label: 새들을 봄 (x3)
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLoverSawBird.stages.3.label: 새들을 봄 (x4)
LanguageData.Ant_BirdLoverSawBird.stages.4.label: 새들을 봄 (5+)
LanguageData.Ant_AteBirdMeatDirect.stages.0.label: 새 고기를 먹음
LanguageData.Ant_AteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.Ant_AteRawFood.stages.0.description: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not animals.
LanguageData.Ant_AteKibble.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.Ant_AteKibble.stages.0.description: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.Ant_AteCorpse.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.Ant_AteCorpse.stages.0.description: I had to eat the flesh of a dead creature without even butchering or cooking it.
LanguageData.Ant_AteInsectMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate insect meat
LanguageData.Ant_AteInsectMeatDirect.stages.0.descrip: I ate some insect meat. It was delicious, but would have been even better cooked.
LanguageData.Ant_AteInsectMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.d: I ate insect meat, cooked into a delicious meal. It was amazing!
LanguageData.Ant_AteRottenFood.stages.0.label: ate rotten food
LanguageData.Ant_AteRottenFood.stages.0.description: I ate some disgusting, putrid food. It was melting in my mouth - but not in a good way.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.0.label: cramped interior
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.0.description: This space is cozy, but a little cramped.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.1.label: cozy interior
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.1.description: This room is small and cozy.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.2.label: spacious interior
LanguageData.Ant_NeedRoomSize.stages.2.description: This room is so expansive, I feel exposed.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.0.label: entombed underground
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.0.description: I've been underground too long. I need to feel the wind and see the birds. I'm worried I will be stuck here forever.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.1.label: cabin fever
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.1.description: I've been stuck inoors too long. I miss seeing the sky and the birds.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.2.label: trapped indoors
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.2.description: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.3.label: stuck indoors
LanguageData.Ant_NeedOutdoors.stages.3.description: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in an awful barrack.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.3.description: I got to sleep in a pretty decent barrack.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.4.description: I got to sleep in a slightly impressive barrack. I like it.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.5.description: I slept in an impressive barrack. It was great.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.6.description: I slept in a very impressive barrack. I love it.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.7.description: I slept in an extremely impressive barrack. It was marvelous.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.8.description: I slept in an unbelievably impressive barrack. It was truly astounding.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBarracks.stages.9.description: I slept in a heavenly barrack. It was wondrous.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in an awful bedroom. Not only was it a horrible room, but I was all alone!
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.1.label: dull bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.1.description: I had to sleep in a dull bedroom. Not only that, but I was all by myself.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.2.label: mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.2.description: I had to sleep in a mediocre bedroom. I really don't like this.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.3.description: I slept in a decent bedroom, but I really dislike being alone.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.4.description: I got to sleep in a pretty nice bedroom. But it would have been better if I could have shared it.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.5.description: I got to sleep in an impressive bedroom. It sucks that I couldn't share it, though.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.6.description: I slept in a very impressive bedroom. I wish I could have shared it.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.7.description: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. I wish I could have shared it.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.8.description: The bedroom I slept in was so impressive. I wish I could have shared it with my friends.
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Ant_SleptInBedroom.stages.9.description: I slept in a bedroom that was simply wondrous. It could only have been better if my friends had been there too.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.0.label: awful prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.0.description: My prison barrack is an awful place.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.3.label: decent prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.3.description: My prison barrack is pretty decent.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.4.label: slightly impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.4.description: My prison barrack seems to be a nice place.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.5.label: impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.5.description: My prison barrack is impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.6.label: very impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.6.description: My prison barrack is very impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this. I love it!
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.7.label: extremely impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.7.description: My prison barrack is extremely impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a room like this. I love it!
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.8.description: My prison barrack is unbelievably impressive. This is the best place ever!
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive prison barrack
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonBarracks.stages.9.description: My prison barrack is the best place one can ever imagine. I can stay here forever.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.0.label: awful cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.0.description: My prison cell is an awful place.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.1.label: dull cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.1.description: I'm living in a dull cell.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.4.label: slightly impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.4.description: My prison cell is slightly impressive.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.5.label: somewhat impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.5.description: My prison cell is impressive. I like it.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.6.label: very impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.6.description: My prison cell is very impressive. I like it.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.7.label: extremely impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.7.description: My prison cell is extremely impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.8.description: My prison cell is unbelievably impressive. I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive cell
LanguageData.Ant_PrisonCell.stages.9.description: My prison cell is wonderful! I can't believe they are keeping me in a place like this.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.label: justified execution
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.descripti: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.label: someone was euthanized
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.descripti: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.label: someone was executed
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.descripti: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.label: someone was organ-murdered
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.descripti: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.label: justified execution of colonist
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.descri: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.label: colonist euthanized
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.descri: A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.label: colonist executed
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.descri: A colonist was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.label: colonist organ-harvested
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.descri: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.de: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistDied.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.Ant_KnowColonistDied.stages.0.descriptio: One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
LanguageData.Ant_PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.des: Such a wonderful person, gone forever. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.Ant_MyHusbandDied.stages.0.label: my husband {0} died
LanguageData.Ant_MyHusbandDied.stages.0.description: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.Ant_MyWifeDied.stages.0.label: my wife {0} died
LanguageData.Ant_MyWifeDied.stages.0.description: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.Ant_MyFianceDied.stages.0.label: my fiance {0} died
LanguageData.Ant_MyFianceDied.stages.0.description: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.Ant_MyFianceeDied.stages.0.label: my fiancée {0} died
LanguageData.Ant_MyFianceeDied.stages.0.description: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.Ant_MyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.Ant_MyLoverDied.stages.0.description: My lover died. I am so alone.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.0.des: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.Ant_ColonistBanished.stages.0.label: colonist banished
LanguageData.Ant_ColonistBanished.stages.0.descriptio: We just banished someone. I hope they'll make it, but I'm worried.
LanguageData.Ant_ColonistBanishedToDie.stages.0.label: colonist banished to death
LanguageData.Ant_ColonistBanishedToDie.stages.0.descr: We banished someone in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
LanguageData.Ant_SoakingWet.stages.0.label: soaking wet
LanguageData.Ant_SoakingWet.stages.0.description: Water! Water everywhere! Aaaaah! Aaaaah! I'm drowning!
LanguageData.Ant_ArtifactMoodBoost.stages.0.label: strange feeling
LanguageData.Ant_ArtifactMoodBoost.stages.0.descripti: I feel strange, but also very relaxed.
LanguageData.Ant_KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.label: a prisoner was sold
LanguageData.Ant_KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.descriptio: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
